subproject.description: Long-term peace and youth projects formulated and funds mobilized; Administrative capacity of the Ministry for National Unity, Reconciliation and Peace and the Ministry for Women, Youth and Children improved; Strategic policy framework for advancing and consolidating reconciliation and peace developed; Implementation of policies for reconciliation and peace strengthened; Monitoring and reporting of progress towards achieving reconciliation and peace strengthened
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: SOI Peace and Youth-PA Stage

title: Strengthening Capacities for Peace Building-PA stage
